summary: Request to support Vite as a bundler for TypeScript SDK instead of Webpack, which is slow (10+ second builds). Community members suggest esbuild as a faster alternative, with one user reporting 0.6s production builds.
userImpact: Users experience slow development and production builds with Webpack, reducing developer productivity during iterative development.
rootCause: Webpack bundler integrated into SDK is slow compared to modern alternatives like Vite and esbuild.
proposedFix: Replace Webpack with Vite or esbuild for faster bundling. esbuild achieves 0.6s production builds compared to 10+ seconds with Webpack.
workaround: Users can use external bundlers like esbuild with custom build scripts (as demonstrated in shared gist), though integration with SDK worker instantiation remains a consideration.
keyQuote: Webpack is great, but it is pretty slow and waiting 10 seconds for bundle to complete can become a nuisance.
